name: She's the One
tagline: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

name: Once
tagline: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

name: Away We Go
tagline: A couple who is expecting their first child travel around the U.S. in order to find a perfect place to start their family. Along the way, they have misadventures and find fresh connections with an assortment of relatives and old friends who just might help them discover "home" on their own terms for the first time.

name: The Visitor
tagline: A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

name: Village of the Damned
tagline: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

name: Fun Size
tagline: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

name: Black Snake Moan
tagline: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

name: Dragonball: Evolution
tagline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

name: Lost in Yonkers
tagline: In the summer of 1942 two young boys are sent to stay with their stern grandmother Kurnitz and their childlike aunt Bella in Yonkers, New York.

name: Talk to Her
tagline: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

name: Gladiator
tagline: Tommy Riley has moved with his dad to Chicago from a 'nice place'. He keeps to himself, goes to school. However, after a street fight he is noticed and quickly falls into the world of illegal underground boxing - where punches can kill.

name: Celtic Pride
tagline: Two over-loyal Celtic fans kidnap their opponent's star player in order to guarantee their team the championship.

name: Return of the Living Dead 2
tagline: Curious kids unearth the barrels that helped revive the dead of the first film, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

name: Bernie
tagline: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp.

name: Fierce Creatures
tagline: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

name: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
tagline: An extended family split up in France and Germany find themselves on opposing sides of the battlefield during World War I.

name: Bad Boys
tagline: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing Paco Moreno's kid brother.

name: A Serious Man
tagline: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern mathematics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

name: Body Parts
tagline: After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.

name: You Can Count on Me
tagline: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely-seen younger brother returns to town.

name: Get Low
tagline: A movie spun out of equal parts folk tale, fable and real-life legend about the mysterious, 1930s Tennessee hermit who famously threw his own rollicking funeral party... while he was still alive.

name: A Mighty Heart
tagline: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband, Daniel, when he goes missing in Pakistan.

name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
tagline: Gilbert has to care for his brother Arnie and his obese mother, which gets in the way when love walks into his life.

name: A Single Man
tagline: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

name: Dead Ringers
tagline: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

name: Switching Channels
tagline: A television news chief courts his anchorwoman ex-wife with an eleventh-hour story.

name: Peeples
tagline: Sparks fly when Wade Walker crashes the Peeples annual reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their precious daughter Grace's hand in marriage.

name: Tap
tagline: Just released from prison, Max Washington must decide which of his previous professions to return to burglar or tap dancer.

name: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
tagline: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

name: Almost an Angel
tagline: A small time crook becomes convinced he has become an angel after a traumatic incident and resolves to perform the work of one.

name: Warlock
tagline: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

name: Le divorce
tagline: French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.

name: Dark Blue
tagline: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

name: First Daughter
tagline: The first daughter of the U.S. President heads off to college where she falls for a graduate student with a secret agenda.

name: Ulee's Gold
tagline: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

name: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
tagline: Set during World War II, a story seen through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
tagline: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

name: Transamerica
tagline: A pre-operative male-to-female transsexual takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

name: White Sands
tagline: A small southwestern town sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and $500,000. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an FBI investigation.

name: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ
tagline: A Jewish prince seeks to find his family and revenge himself upon his childhood friend who had him wrongly imprisoned.

name: Doctor Dolittle
tagline: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientèle, he and his friends escape their hometown to sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

name: Cat's Eye
tagline: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
tagline: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs and sleaze.

name: Shane
tagline: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

name: Aliens of the Deep
tagline: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet's most unique life forms.

name: In the Mouth of Madness
tagline: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

name: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
tagline: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.

name: Battle of the Year
tagline: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.

name: Mystery, Alaska
tagline: This comedy is about the residents of a small town who get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event

name: White Fang 2: Myth of the White Wolf
tagline: In order to save one of the last Alaskin native tribes, Fang bands together with a friend of his master to stop miners from destroying a sacred land.

name: Nightbreed
tagline: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of monsters are hiding from humanity.

name: Everybody's Fine
tagline: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

name: Apt Pupil
tagline: A boy blackmails his neighbour after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

name: Movie 43
tagline: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

name: The Deep End
tagline: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.

name: The Ice Harvest
tagline: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

name: The River
tagline: Farming family battles severe storms, a bank threatening to reposses their farm, and other hard times in a battle to save and hold on to their farm.

name: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
tagline: A boy's life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.

name: Saved!
tagline: When a girl attending a Christian high school becomes pregnant, she finds herself ostracized and demonized, as all of her former friends turn on her.

name: The Next Karate Kid
tagline: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.

name: The Five Heartbeats
tagline: The story of the rise and fall of an African American vocal group.

name: True Believer
tagline: A cynical former civil liberties attorney now reduced to "specializing" in defending drug dealers becomes transformed by an eight-year-old murder case.

name: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
tagline: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes into a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.

name: Whatever It Takes
tagline: A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.

name: Suspect Zero
tagline: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers - and one FBI agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

name: Clean and Sober
tagline: A hustling drug addict checks himself into rehab to escape trouble with the law, and realizes that it's exactly what he needs.

name: Bingo
tagline: A runaway circus dog befriends a young boy who has trouble fitting in with his friends.

name: My Life in Ruins
tagline: A travel guide rediscovers her romantic side on a trip around Greece.

name: The Puppet Masters
tagline: The Earth is invaded by alien "slugs" that ride on people's backs and control their minds.

name: Manhunter
tagline: An F.B.I. specialist tracks a serial killer who appears to select his victims at random.

name: All Dogs Go to Heaven 2
tagline: Charlie and Itchy return to Earth to find Gabriel's Horn, but along the way meet up with a young boy named David, who ran away from home.

name: U2: Rattle and Hum
tagline: A documentary of Irish rock group U2's Fall 1987 tour of North America.

name: The Man with One Red Shoe
tagline: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

name: Pollock
tagline: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

name: Boat Trip
tagline: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

name: Death at a Funeral
tagline: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.

name: Leprechaun
tagline: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.

name: Blue Velvet
tagline: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of criminals who have kidnapped her child.

name: Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation
Without a Clue
tagline: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective - Dr Watson.
